relation: BaseFileCleanerDelegate Base class for file cleaners which allows subclasses to implement a simple isFileDeletable method (which used to be the FileCleanerDelegate contract).
BaseHFileCleanerDelegate Base class for the hfile cleaning function inside the master.
BaseLogCleanerDelegate Base class for the log cleaning function inside the master.
HFileLinkCleaner HFileLink cleaner that determines if a hfile should be deleted.
TimeToLiveHFileCleaner HFile cleaner that uses the timestamp of the hfile to determine if it should be deleted.
TimeToLiveLogCleaner Log cleaner that uses the timestamp of the wal to determine if it should be deleted.
title: Subclasses of BaseConfigurable in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.cleaner
